vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ὀνησίφορος, -ου, ὁ
(i.e. bringing advantage),
Onesiphorus: 2Ti.1:16 4:19.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at 2Ti.1.16
§ Onesiphorus, "one bringing usefulness"
Onesiphorus, (Proper name), 2Tim. 1:16; 4:19*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
阿尼色弗 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "帶來利益"
一位基督徒的名字 (提後 1:16-18; 4:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
阿尼色弗 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "带来利益"
一位基督徒的名字 (提后 1:16-18; 4:19)
